TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Nadan, title = Nadan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nadan} }

S.FORM: Nadan Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Nadan a niyaro', 25 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 73 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 81% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 59 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 19% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 75%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%, roma 3%.

Nadan Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitong ko Nadan a niyaro', 25 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 73 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 81% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 59 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 19% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 75%, Tayal 1%, Troko 1%, roma 3%.
